data.title: Ferro Rod Fire Starter BCF-8 with CS6010 Ceramic Striker
data.meta_description: Creates big sparks up to 3000˚C for easy fire making also in humid weather conditions With standard size CS6010 - ceramic fire steel striker, can be used even with gloves on Elegant and functional T( trapezoidal) sheath, aqua-green retaining beads embellish the audience 8*80mm replaceable threaded ferro rod with beech
data.text:
Creates big sparks up to 3000˚C for easy fire making also in humid weather conditions

With standard size CS6010 - ceramic fire steel striker, can be used even with gloves on

Elegant and functional T( trapezoidal) sheath, aqua-green retaining beads embellish the audience

8*80mm replaceable threaded ferro rod with beech wood handle is comfortable and durable

Connects all the parts by a soft but tough leather cord to be a NexLand-Style fire starter

All parts can be freely purchased and replaced

Reconnect the modern world with the ancestral art of fire.

A low-waste way to ensure fire, again, again and again.

Support responsible use of fire in the great outdoors.

It’s a beautiful thing!

The bushcraft-style fire steel BCF8 can creates big sparks up to 3000˚C for easy fire making also in humid weather conditions.

Wooden handle, replaceable ferro rod, leader cord and sheath, striker... All parts can be replaced as much as possible, Besides, you are still a craftsman.

SPEC

# Striker

CS6010 Ceramic Striker

CK1 Ceramic Folding Knife

HS6010 High Speed Steel

# Fire Steel / Ferro Rod

Replaceable，DIA 8*80mm(0.31*3.15 inch )

Brass nut, wooden handle

# Cord and T-sheath
